Name: Systematic Insanity
About the game: Nami - a Perfect Student - receives a 'special award' on her Graduation Day - but then inherits the challenges of its illogical consequences. Her popularity.. her intelligence.. - and even her beauty - become 'gambling tokens' - in a game tailored just for her. Witness the Story of Nami as she confronts the spell of a crazy conspiracy! Will she win against the modern witchcraft of social manipulation? Systematic Insanity is like reading a novel while watching a movie. Novels are read. Movies are watched. Why not try 'reading a movie'? This Cinematic Reading Experience™ is now available on Steam! Go beyond first impressions to uncover its 'secret story'! Clue: The Yellow Door Nami is the heroine of Systematic Insanity. Since she excels in both academic and athletic subjects, she's considered a Perfect Student and School Role Model. Her near-perfect status, abilities and ethical values are put to the test. She never thought that her Final Exam would be on her Graduation Day! Mysterious Red-Haired Lady She is refined in taste and manner and is extremely wealthy too. Beyond these first impressions, lies a weird discovery which includes a biological secret that mirrors herself. Loraine is Nami's Best Friend. She learned to break her 'shy shell' with Nami's inspired guidance. As the School's Official Event Host, she is also fondly called MC Loraine. Her close friendship with Nami becomes a Key Link to the Story's Events. Nami in Bikini Mode. It has more to do with friendship, courage and sacrifice and is not just a display of beauty and sexiness. It is a noble choice.
